register.reg_long_name: Interrupt Controller Virtual Highest Priority Pending Interrupt Register 1
register.reg_condition: when AArch32 is supported at any Exception level

purpose_text.para: Indicates the highest priority pending virtual Group 1 interrupt on the virtual CPU interface.

field_description.para: The INTID of the highest priority pending virtual interrupt.
If the highest priority pending interrupt is not observable, this field contains a special INTID to indicate the reason. This special INTID can take the value 1023 only. See , for more information.
This field has either 16 or 24 bits implemented. The number of implemented bits can be found in ICV_CTLR.IDbits. If only 16 bits are implemented, bits [23:16] of this register are RES0.
